divs: Sighting DetailsWe had just arrived home after going out for dinner, as we got out of the car my#2 son said whats that?and pointed to the trees approx. 150yds away. Just abovethe treeline a craft was coming towards us directly down the street. It wastriangular, black, with orange lights at each corner, and completely silent. Itwas tilted in its flight as though banking, but was flying straight and true. asit passed over us, we could hear an electric crackling sound, but it wasotherwise silent.It was also travelling no faster than a fast walk. We watchedit until it disappeared to the west towards portland ore. aprox. 5 minutes.
trends: There has been one other sighting in Washougal
There were no other sightings in Washougal on or around May 29th 1990
Summary: A craft flew soundlessly overhead at no more 60-80
